beers.name: Hopzilla
beers.description: An intensely hoppy IPA with citrus and tropical notes. Balanced bitterness and medium body.

beers.name: Hazy Heaven
beers.description: A hazy IPA with fresh hop aroma and fruity flavors. Smooth mouthfeel and juicy finish.

beers.name: Amber Ale
beers.description: An amber-colored beer with toasty and caramel notes. Perfect balance between malt and hops.

beers.name: Belgian Tripel
beers.description: A golden Belgian ale with spicy and fruity aromas. Medium body and dry finish with a hint of sweetness.

beers.name: Munich Helles
beers.description: A clear and refreshing German lager. Smooth, balanced, and subtly floral bitterness.

beers.name: Vienna Lager
beers.description: An amber lager with a smooth malt flavor and hints of caramel. Medium body and clean finish.

beers.name: Chocolate Stout
beers.description: A dark and silky stout with intense chocolate and coffee flavors. Full-bodied with a slightly bitter finish.

beers.name: Irish Dry Stout
beers.description: A dry stout with roasted flavors and a touch of coffee. Light body and a smooth, balanced finish.

beers.name: Wheat Beer
beers.description: A light and refreshing wheat beer with notes of banana and spices. Light body and high carbonation.

beers.name: Pilsner
beers.description: A light golden pilsner with mild bitterness and malty flavor. Refreshing and easy to drink.

hamburgers.name: Classic Burger
hamburgers.description: Delicious burger with beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and special sauce. Served on a brioche bun.

hamburgers.name: Cheeseburger
hamburgers.description: A classic burger with a generous portion of melted cheddar cheese. Accompanied by lettuce, tomato, and onion.

hamburgers.name: Bacon Burger
hamburgers.description: A juicy burger with crispy bacon, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and caramelized onions. A flavor explosion!

hamburgers.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
hamburgers.description: Burger topped with sautéed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese. Accompanied by fresh lettuce and tomato.

hamburgers.name: Spicy Jalapeño Burger
hamburgers.description: Burger with a spicy kick, pickled jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, lettuce, and tomato. Perfect for spice lovers!

hamburgers.name: BBQ Burger
hamburgers.description: Burger with barbecue sauce, crispy onion rings, cheddar cheese, and fresh lettuce. An irresistible combination!

hamburgers.name: Guacamole Burger
hamburgers.description: Burger with homemade guacamole, Monterey Jack cheese, slices of fresh tomato, and crispy lettuce. A delicious and refreshing option.

hamburgers.name: Blue Cheese Burger
hamburgers.description: Burger topped with crumbled blue cheese, caramelized onions, and fresh spinach. A bold flavor for cheese lovers.

hamburgers.name: Hawaiian Burger
hamburgers.description: Burger with an irresistible combination of ham, grilled pineapple, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and teriyaki sauce. A tropical explosion!

hamburgers.name: Veggie Burger
hamburgers.description: Vegetarian burger made with a blend of vegetables, beans, and spices. Served with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo.

platters.name: Classic Platter
platters.description: A combination of cured meats such as salami, ham, cheese, olives, and homemade bread.

platters.name: Mediterranean Platter
platters.description: A selection of assorted cheeses, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, country bread, and dips.

platters.name: Seafood Platter
platters.description: A mix of shrimp, mussels, calamari, octopus, and seafood sauces. Served with fresh bread.

platters.name: Artisanal Cheese Platter
platters.description: A tasting of artisanal cheeses such as brie, gouda, roquefort, and goat cheese. Accompanied by dried fruits and homemade bread.

platters.name: Vegetarian Platter
platters.description: A variety of fresh vegetables, hummus, yogurt dips, and whole-grain bread. Perfect for vegan food lovers.

pizzas.name: Margherita Pizza
pizzas.description: Traditional pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and basil leaves.

pizzas.name: Pepperoni Pizza
pizzas.description: Classic pizza with a generous amount of pepperoni and melted cheese.

pizzas.name: Vegetarian Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza topped with a variety of fresh vegetables, including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives.

pizzas.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza with grilled chicken, barbecue sauce, red onions, and cilantro for a tangy and savory flavor.

pizzas.name: Hawaiian Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza topped with ham, pineapple, and melted cheese, offering a sweet and savory combination.

pizzas.name: Meat Lover's Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza loaded with various types of meat such as sausage, bacon, pepperoni, and ham.

pizzas.name: Mediterranean Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza topped with ingredients like feta cheese, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, and fresh herbs.

pizzas.name: Four Cheese Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza with a delightful combination of mozzarella, cheddar, provolone, and gorgonzola cheeses.

pizzas.name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza featuring buffalo sauce-coated chicken, blue cheese dressing, and a drizzle of ranch.

pizzas.name: Vegan Pizza
pizzas.description: Pizza made with vegan cheese, a variety of vegetables, and a flavorful tomato sauce.

gourmet.name: Grilled Chicken
gourmet.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast served with roasted vegetables.

gourmet.name: Pasta Primavera
gourmet.description: Delicious pasta tossed with fresh vegetables and Parmesan cheese.

gourmet.name: Beef Tacos
gourmet.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, topped with salsa and guacamole.

gourmet.name: Salmon Salad
gourmet.description: Grilled salmon fillet served over mixed greens with a tangy vinaigrette.

gourmet.name: Mushroom Risotto
gourmet.description: Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms and finished with Parmesan cheese.

gourmet.name: Vegetable Curry
gourmet.description: Aromatic vegetable curry served with basmati rice and naan bread.

gourmet.name: Steak Fajitas
gourmet.description: Sizzling strips of steak with bell peppers and onions, served with tortillas.

gourmet.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
gourmet.description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

gourmet.name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
gourmet.description: Chicken breast stuffed with spinach and feta cheese, served with a side of vegetables.

desserts.name: Chocolate Brownie
desserts.description: A rich and decadent chocolate brownie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

desserts.name: New York Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy and smooth cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

desserts.name: Apple Pie
desserts.description: Classic apple pie made with fresh apples and a flaky crust.

desserts.name: Strawberry Shortcake
desserts.description: Layers of fluffy sponge cake, fresh strawberries, and whipped cream.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Italian dessert made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

desserts.name: Lemon Tart
desserts.description: Tangy and refreshing lemon tart with a buttery crust.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing cocktail made with rum, lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and soda water.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: A classic cocktail made with vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, and triple sec.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: A timeless cocktail made with whiskey, sugar, water, and bitters.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A bitter and sweet cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: A classic tequila-based cocktail made with lime juice and triple sec.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.description: A classic cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar.

drinks.name: Martini
drinks.description: A sophisticated cocktail made with gin (or vodka) and dry vermouth.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.description: A fruity cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and simple syrup.

withoutAlcohol.name: Sparkling Lemonade
withoutAlcohol.description: Refreshing lemonade with a sparkling twist.

withoutAlcohol.name: Virgin Mojito
withoutAlcohol.description: A classic minty and citrusy mocktail.

withoutAlcohol.name: Cucumber Cooler
withoutAlcohol.description: Cool off with this refreshing blend of cucumber and lime.

withoutAlcohol.name: Berry Blast Smoothie
withoutAlcohol.description: A delicious blend of mixed berries and yogurt.

withoutAlcohol.name: Iced Matcha Latte
withoutAlcohol.description: A creamy and energizing green tea latte over ice.

withoutAlcohol.name: Pineapple Paradise
withoutAlcohol.description: A tropical blend of pineapple, coconut, and orange juice.

withoutAlcohol.name: Watermelon Refresher
withoutAlcohol.description: Quench your thirst with this revitalizing watermelon drink.

withoutAlcohol.name: Ginger Fizz
withoutAlcohol.description: A bubbly and invigorating ginger ale-based mocktail.

withoutAlcohol.name: Mango Lassi
withoutAlcohol.description: A traditional Indian yogurt-based smoothie with mango.

withoutAlcohol.name: Cranberry Spritzer
withoutAlcohol.description: A tangy and sparkling cranberry-infused mocktail.
